data.text: Hello @Thrubeingcool2 @BorisJohnson #lie : As Foreign Secretary, referred to Africa as a 'country'. #BorisJohnson #NotMyPrimeMinister #NotMyPM #BorisJohnsonShouldNotBePM

@WelshConserv The British surge” to assist #Ukraine #Refugees at Calais turns out to be 3 officials, some crisps & Kit Kats & not a chance of a visa. Unless you go to Paris. Thank you @BBCMarkEaston reporting the facts - #BorisJohnson & @pritipatel
rhetoric doesn’t meet reality. Disgraceful

@WelshConserv Your government didn’t feed its kids.

How many billions were given to cronies?
@WelshConserv What influence can a minority party have? Drakeford, like the rest of us, just ignore you. #JohnsonOut40

@WelshConserv Pathetic. U happily accept money from Fascists. Money stolen from the Russian people by those who have stripped democracy bare in Russia, & u have the temerity to moan about having to wear a piece of cloth over your gobs. AS IF YOU CARED FOR HUMAN RIGHTS OR FREEDOM. #Putinpatsies
@WelshConserv I was actually impressed with your grown up tweet the other day, congratulating Wales being the first UK nation to get the economy back to pre covid levels. Today, back to the bore.
